trans-unit.source: Option 1: Use Windows PowerShell for StorSimple to install Update 1
trans-unit.target: Option 1: Use Windows PowerShell for StorSimple to install Update 1

trans-unit.source: Explains how to use Windows PowerShell for StorSimple to install StorSimple 8000 Series Update 1.
trans-unit.target: Explains how to use Windows PowerShell for StorSimple to install StorSimple 8000 Series Update 1.

trans-unit.source: To install Update 1 from Windows PowerShell for StorSimple
trans-unit.target: To install Update 1 from Windows PowerShell for StorSimple

trans-unit.source: Perform the following steps to download the software update.
trans-unit.target: Perform the following steps to download the software update.

trans-unit.source: Start Internet Explorer and navigate to [http://catalog.update.microsoft.com/v7/site/Home.aspx](http://catalog.update.microsoft.com/v7/site/Home.aspx).
trans-unit.target: Start Internet Explorer and navigate to [http://catalog.update.microsoft.com/v7/site/Home.aspx](http://catalog.update.microsoft.com/v7/site/Home.aspx).

trans-unit.source: If you are a first-time user, you will be prompted to install a Microsoft Update Catalog.
trans-unit.target: If you are a first-time user, you will be prompted to install a Microsoft Update Catalog.

trans-unit.source: Click **Install**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Install**.

trans-unit.source: Install catalog
trans-unit.target: Install catalog

trans-unit.source: You will see a catalog search screen.
trans-unit.target: You will see a catalog search screen.

trans-unit.source: Enter **3063418** in the search box, and click **Search**.
trans-unit.target: Enter **3063418** in the search box, and click **Search**.

trans-unit.source: Search catalog
trans-unit.target: Search catalog

trans-unit.source: You will see the **StorSimple Update 1.0 Appliance Update** bundle.
trans-unit.target: You will see the **StorSimple Update 1.0 Appliance Update** bundle.

trans-unit.source: Click **Add**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Add**.

trans-unit.source: The update will be added to the basket.
trans-unit.target: The update will be added to the basket.

trans-unit.source: Update bundle
trans-unit.target: Update bundle

trans-unit.source: Click **View Basket**.
trans-unit.target: Click **View Basket**.

trans-unit.source: View basket
trans-unit.target: View basket

trans-unit.source: Click **Download**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Download**.

trans-unit.source: Specify or Browse to a local location where you want the download to appear.
trans-unit.target: Specify or Browse to a local location where you want the download to appear.

trans-unit.source: The update (all-hcsmdssoftwareupdate_288da2cc8cd2e3c3958b603a79346cb586fb8fe3.exe) will be downloaded in a StorSimple Update 1.0 Appliance Update bundle (KB3063418)” folder to the chosen location.
trans-unit.target: The update (all-hcsmdssoftwareupdate_288da2cc8cd2e3c3958b603a79346cb586fb8fe3.exe) will be downloaded in a StorSimple Update 1.0 Appliance Update bundle (KB3063418)” folder to the chosen location.

trans-unit.source: The folder can also be copied to a network share that is reachable from the device.
trans-unit.target: The folder can also be copied to a network share that is reachable from the device.

trans-unit.source: To install the software update, access the Windows PowerShell interface on your StorSimple device serial console.
trans-unit.target: To install the software update, access the Windows PowerShell interface on your StorSimple device serial console.

trans-unit.source: Follow the detailed instructions in [Use PuTTy to connect to the serial console](#use-putty-to-connect-to-the-serial-console).
trans-unit.target: Follow the detailed instructions in [Use PuTTy to connect to the serial console](#use-putty-to-connect-to-the-serial-console).

trans-unit.source: At the command prompt, press Enter.
trans-unit.target: At the command prompt, press Enter.

trans-unit.source: Select **Option 1** to log on to the device with full access.
trans-unit.target: Select **Option 1** to log on to the device with full access.

trans-unit.source: To install the update package, at the command prompt, type:
trans-unit.target: To install the update package, at the command prompt, type:

trans-unit.source: The credential parameter is used only if you are accessing an authenticated share.
trans-unit.target: The credential parameter is used only if you are accessing an authenticated share.

trans-unit.source: Sample output is shown below.
trans-unit.target: Sample output is shown below.

trans-unit.source: Type **Y** when prompted to confirm the hotfix installation.
trans-unit.target: Type **Y** when prompted to confirm the hotfix installation.

trans-unit.source: Monitor the update by using the Get-HcsUpdateStatus cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: Monitor the update by using the Get-HcsUpdateStatus cmdlet.

trans-unit.source: The following sample output shows the update in progress.
trans-unit.target: The following sample output shows the update in progress.

trans-unit.source: The following sample output indicates that the update is finished.
trans-unit.target: The following sample output indicates that the update is finished.

trans-unit.source: After the software update is complete, navigate to the Maintenance page in the Management Portal.
trans-unit.target: After the software update is complete, navigate to the Maintenance page in the Management Portal.

trans-unit.source: Scan for available updates.
trans-unit.target: Scan for available updates.

trans-unit.source: You should see that more software updates are available.
trans-unit.target: You should see that more software updates are available.

trans-unit.source: Click **Install updates** to apply all the available software updates from the portal.
trans-unit.target: Click **Install updates** to apply all the available software updates from the portal.

trans-unit.source: After the software updates are complete, verify the system software, driver, and firmware versions.
trans-unit.target: After the software updates are complete, verify the system software, driver, and firmware versions.

trans-unit.source: Type the following command:
trans-unit.target: Type the following command:

trans-unit.source: You should see the following versions:
trans-unit.target: You should see the following versions:

trans-unit.source: HcsSoftwareVersion: 6.3.9600.17491
trans-unit.target: HcsSoftwareVersion: 6.3.9600.17491

trans-unit.source: CisAgentVersion: 1.0.9037.0
trans-unit.target: CisAgentVersion: 1.0.9037.0

trans-unit.source: MdsAgentVersion: 26.0.4696.1433
trans-unit.target: MdsAgentVersion: 26.0.4696.1433

trans-unit.source: To verify that the firmware was updated correctly, type:
trans-unit.target: To verify that the firmware was updated correctly, type:

trans-unit.source: The firmware status should be **UpToDate**.
trans-unit.target: The firmware status should be **UpToDate**.
